doc:
Mira Sorvino https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mira_Sorvino 0 Mira Katherine Sorvino (; born September 28, 1967) is an American actress. She won the Academy Award and Golden Globe for Best Supporting Actress for her performance in Woody Allen's Mighty Aphrodite (1995). She also starred in the films Romy and Michele's High School Reunion (1997), Mimic (1997), Lulu on the Bridge (1998), The Replacement Killers (1998), Summer of Sam (1999), and Like Dandelion Dust (2009). She received Golden Globe and Emmy nominations for her role in Norma Jean Marilyn (1996), and a Golden Globe nomination for her role in Human Trafficking (2005). Mira_Katherine_Sorvino ( ; born September_28_,_1967 ) is an_American_actress . She won the_Academy_Award and Golden_Globe_for_Best_Supporting_Actress for her_performance in Woody_Allen 's_Mighty_Aphrodite_(_1995_) . She also starred in the_films_Romy and Michele 's_High_School_Reunion_(_1997_) , Mimic_(_1997_) , Lulu on the_Bridge_(_1998_) , The_Replacement_Killers_(_1998_) , Summer of Sam_(_1999_) , and Like Dandelion_Dust_(_2009_) . She received Golden_Globe_and_Emmy_nominations for her_role in Norma_Jean_(_1996_) , and a_Golden_Globe_nomination for her_role in Human_Trafficking_(_2005_) .
